channel.title: Lionfish Apps
channel.description:
![](upload://kW7SC0j9bX11MBznymZTK68turz.png)
Hey guys, I've posted about my apps before, but I'm much more organized about the whole thing now. My website is [url='https://www.lionfishapps.com/']Lionfish Apps[/url]
I make Android apps. My latest one, [url='https://www.lionfishapps.com/?app=cw']Clean Widgets[/url] is currently on sale for $1.30, because Deutsch Telekom is featuring it in their TopApps campaign, and asked that I do a week long price drop (that's November 29th through December 6th, then it goes back to the usual $1.99).
I would love you guys' feedback on my apps (and your downloads of course.. hehe).

item.title: Lionfish Apps
item.dc:creator: NickAVV
item.description:
728×90 138 KB

Hey guys, I’ve posted about my apps before, but I’m much more organized about the whole thing now. My website is Lionfish Apps

I make Android apps. My latest one, Clean Widgets is currently on sale for $1.30, because Deutsch Telekom is featuring it in their TopApps campaign, and asked that I do a week long price drop (that’s November 29th through December 6th, then it goes back to the usual $1.99).

I would love you guys’ feedback on my apps (and your downloads of course… hehe).
